introduction_japanese: 「任せる」は、仕事や学校の分担、会議での決めごと、家事や片付け、旅行の手配、プロや専門家にお願いするときの会話でよく使う動詞です。ときどき、物事を自然の流れにゆだねる話でも使います。
introduction_english: The verb まかせる is commonly used when talking about dividing tasks at work or school, making decisions in meetings, chores and tidying, arranging travel, and asking a professional to handle something. It also appears when you talk about letting things follow their natural course.
meanings: to leave a matter or decision to someone
to leave to chance or one's imagination
to let take its own course; to let happen
to use something to the full (as ～に任せて)
meaning_explanation_japanese: 「任せる」は、人に決めてもらったり仕事をしてもらったりすること、または成り行きにゆだねることを表します。さらに「〜に任せて」で、お金や力・時間などを思いきり使うという意味にもなります。
meaning_explanation_english: The word まかせる means to leave something to someone or have them decide or do it, and also to let things take their natural course. With the pattern ～に任せて, it can mean using money, strength, or time to the full.
kanji_explanation: The first kanji means responsibility and entrusting something. You see it in words like にんむ, a duty or mission you are assigned. It also appears in せきにん, the responsibility you carry. So it gives the feeling of being appointed to handle something.
synonyms: 委ねる : ゆだねる : to entrust; to hand over control
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of the まかせる is ゆだねる. It sounds a bit more formal or literary and suggests yielding control or judgment, very close to entrusting.
antonyms: 引き受ける : ひきうける : to take on; to undertake oneself
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the まかせる is ひきうける. It means you take the task or responsibility yourself, the opposite of handing it to someone else.

collocations.kanji: 管理を専門業者に任せる
collocations.furigana: 管理を専門業者に任せる

collocations.kanji: 掃除を全面的に任せる
collocations.furigana: 掃除を全面的に任せる

collocations.kanji: 片付けを後任者に任せる
collocations.furigana: 片付けを後任者に任せる

collocations.kanji: 手配を現地スタッフに任せる
collocations.furigana: 手配を現地スタッフに任せる

example_sentences.kanji: この仕事を先輩に任せます。
example_sentences.furigana: この仕事(しごと)を先輩(せんぱい)に任(まか)せます。

translations.EN: I will leave this job to my superiors.
translations.ID: Saya akan menyerahkan pekerjaan ini kepada atasan saya.
translations.ES: Dejaré este trabajo a mis superiores.
translations.VI: Tôi sẽ giao công việc này cho cấp trên của tôi.
translations.FR: Je laisserai ce travail à mes supérieurs.
translations.NE: म यो काम मेरा वरिष्ठहरूलाई छोड्नेछु।
translations.BN: আমি এই কাজটি আমার ঊর্ধ্বতনদের উপর ছেড়ে দেব।
translations.ZH: 我会把这个工作交给我的上级。
translations.TL: Ipapaubaya ko ang trabahong ito sa aking mga nakatataas.
translations.MY: ဒီအလုပ်က အထက်လူကြီးကို ထားခဲ့မယ်။
translations.HI: मैं यह काम अपने वरिष्ठों पर छोड़ दूंगा।
translations.FA: این کار را به مافوق‌هایم واگذار می‌کنم.

example_sentences.kanji: 判断は他人に任せます。
example_sentences.furigana: 判断(はんだん)は他人(たにん)に任(まか)せます。

translations.EN: I leave the decision to others.
translations.ID: Saya serahkan keputusannya pada orang lain.
translations.VI: Tôi để người khác quyết định.
translations.FR: Je laisse la décision à d'autres.
translations.BN: আমি সিদ্ধান্ত অন্যদের উপর ছেড়ে দিচ্ছি।
translations.ZH: 我把决定权留给其他人。
translations.TL: Ipinapaubaya ko sa iba ang desisyon.
translations.HI: मैं निर्णय दूसरों पर छोड़ता हूं।
translations.FA: تصمیم گیری را به دیگران واگذار می کنم.

example_sentences.kanji: この問題は専門家に任せましょう。
example_sentences.furigana: この問題(もんだい)は専門家(せんもんか)に任(まか)せましょう。

translations.EN: Leave this issue to the experts.
translations.ES: Deje este asunto en manos de los expertos.
translations.VI: Hãy để vấn đề này cho các chuyên gia.
translations.BN: এই বিষয়টি বিশেষজ্ঞদের উপর ছেড়ে দিন।
translations.ZH: 把这个问题留给专家去解决吧。
translations.TL: Ipaubaya ang isyung ito sa mga eksperto.
translations.MY: ဒီကိစ္စကို ကျွမ်းကျင်သူတွေဆီ ထားခဲ့ပါ။
translations.HI: इस मुद्दे को विशेषज्ञों पर छोड़ दें।
translations.FA: این موضوع را به متخصصان بسپارید.

example_sentences.kanji: それは私に任せてください。
example_sentences.furigana: それは私(わたし)に任(まか)せてください。

translations.TL: Iwanan mo na yan sa akin.

example_sentences.kanji: 旅行の手配は完全に任せます。
example_sentences.furigana: 旅行(りょこう)の手配(てはい)は完全(かんぜん)に任(まか)せます。

translations.EN: Travel arrangements are entirely up to you.
translations.ES: Los arreglos de viaje dependen completamente de usted.
translations.VI: Việc sắp xếp chuyến đi hoàn toàn phụ thuộc vào bạn.
translations.FR: Les modalités de votre voyage dépendent entièrement de vous.
translations.NE: यात्राको व्यवस्था पूर्णतया तपाईंमा निर्भर छ।
translations.BN: ভ্রমণের ব্যবস্থা সম্পূর্ণ আপনার উপর নির্ভর করে।
translations.ZH: 旅行安排完全由您决定。
translations.TL: Ang mga kaayusan sa paglalakbay ay ganap na nakasalalay sa iyo.
translations.MY: ခရီးသွားအစီအစဉ်များသည် သင့်အတွက် လုံးလုံးလျားလျားဖြစ်သည်။
translations.HI: यात्रा की व्यवस्था पूरी तरह आप पर निर्भर है।
translations.FA: برنامه‌ریزی سفر کاملاً به خودتان بستگی دارد.

example_sentences.kanji: 流れに任せておきます。
example_sentences.furigana: 流(なが)れに任(まか)せておきます。

translations.EN: I'll just go with the flow.
translations.ES: Simplemente me dejaré llevar por la corriente.
translations.VI: Tôi chỉ cần thuận theo tự nhiên thôi.
translations.FR: Je vais juste suivre le courant.
translations.TL: I'll just go with the flow.
translations.MY: စီးဆင်းမှုနဲ့အတူ ငါသွားလိုက်မယ်။
translations.HI: मैं बस बहाव के साथ चलूंगा।
translations.FA: من فقط با جریان پیش خواهم رفت.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は企画を任されました。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は企画(きかく)を任(まか)されました。

translations.EN: He was put in charge of the planning.
translations.VI: Ông được giao phụ trách việc lập kế hoạch.
translations.FR: Il a été chargé de la planification.
translations.ZH: 他被任命负责这项规划。
translations.TL: Siya ang inilagay na namamahala sa pagpaplano.
translations.MY: အစီအစဥ်ကို တာဝန်ယူဆောင်ရွက်ခဲ့သည်။
translations.HI: उन्हें योजना का प्रभारी बनाया गया।

to leave to chance or one's imagination.ID: menyerahkannya pada kesempatan atau imajinasi seseorang
to leave to chance or one's imagination.ES: dejar al azar o a la imaginación
to leave to chance or one's imagination.VI: để mặc cho sự may rủi hoặc trí tưởng tượng của một người
to leave to chance or one's imagination.FR: laisser au hasard ou à son imagination
to leave to chance or one's imagination.BN: ভাগ্য বা কল্পনার উপর ছেড়ে দেওয়া
to leave to chance or one's imagination.TL: iwan sa pagkakataon o imahinasyon ng isa

to leave to chance or one's imagination.HI: संयोग या अपनी कल्पना पर छोड़ देना
to leave to chance or one's imagination.FA: به شانس یا تخیل خود واگذار کردن

to use something to the full (as ～に任せて).ID: untuk menggunakan sesuatu secara penuh (sebagai ～に任せて)
to use something to the full (as ～に任せて).ES: usar algo al máximo (como ～に任せて)
to use something to the full (as ～に任せて).VI: sử dụng cái gì đó một cách triệt để (như ～に任せて)
to use something to the full (as ～に任せて).FR: utiliser quelque chose au maximum (comme ～に任せて)

to use something to the full (as ～に任せて).BN: সম্পূর্ণরূপে কিছু ব্যবহার করতে (যেমন ～に任せて)
to use something to the full (as ～に任せて).ZH: 充分利用某物（如～に任せて）
to use something to the full (as ～に任せて).KO: 어떤 것을 최대한 활용하다 (~に任せて)
to use something to the full (as ～に任せて).TL: gumamit ng isang bagay nang buo (bilang ～に任せて)
to use something to the full (as ～に任せて).MY: တစ်ခုခုကို အပြည့်အဝသုံးရန် (～に任せて)၊
to use something to the full (as ～に任せて).HI: किसी चीज़ का पूर्ण उपयोग करना (जैसे ～に任せて)
to use something to the full (as ～に任せて).AR: لاستخدام شيء ما إلى أقصى حد (مثل ～に任せて)
to use something to the full (as ～に任せて).FA: استفاده کامل از چیزی (به عنوان ～に任せて)

english_definitions: to leave (a matter, decision, etc. to someone)
to leave (to chance, one's imagination, etc.)
to use (money, strength, spare time, etc.) to the full
